import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Router from 'next/router' import { topics } from '../../api/home' import axios from 'axios' import styles from './content.sass' const Content = ({ topics }) => { const [routeName, setRouteName] = useState('') useEffect(() => { axios.get('https://cnodejs.org/api/v1/topics').then(res => { console.log(res) }) setRouteName(Router.router.query.name) }) return (
